mode.name: available_prefixes
mode.query: SELECT text as prefix FROM web_user_prefix WHERE text != '.' ORDER BY text

mode.name: get_satconfig_value
mode.query: SELECT value FROM rhnConfiguration WHERE key = :key

write-mode.name: set_satconfig_value
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhnConfiguration SET value = :value WHERE key = :key

write-mode.name: reset_satconfig_default_value
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhnConfiguration SET value = default_value WHERE key = :key
